title: Rust Lifetime Annotations Borrow Checker
description: In this lab, the concept of explicit lifetime annotations in Rust is introduced, which are used by the borrow checker to determine the validity of references.

meta.title: Rust Lifetime Annotations and Borrow Checker
meta.description: Explore the concept of explicit lifetime annotations in Rust and how the borrow checker determines the validity of references.
meta.keywords: rust playground, borrow checker, rust tutor, rust online compiler, lifetime annotations, rust commands, references, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
